data.title: Midnight Sealed-Bid: Private Auction Protocol
data.summary: Public auctions on Cardano face front-running, sniping, and price anchoring. Lack of bid privacy exposes user balances, discouraging high-net-worth participation.
data.solution: We build an open-source Sealed-Bid Auction POC on Midnight. ZK proofs keep bids encrypted until the end, ensuring fairness and privacy without revealing losing bids.

data.title: Private RWA Tokenization: Secure Token Sale Framework
data.summary: Midnight will be excluded from a massive financial sector without a privacy-preserving framework for tokenizing real-world assets and distributing ownership through shielded native tokens.
data.solution: Enable tokenization and practical distribution of real-world asset ownership through shielded native tokens on Midnight.

data.title: ZeroTag: Privacy Preserving RFID-NFT Mapping Protocol
data.summary: Current systems that represent ownership of physical assets through RFID-NFT based are vulnerable due to centralized UID–NFT mapping, leading to risks of data tampering and asset duplication.
data.solution: A decentralized RFID-NFT protocol on the Midnight network that encrypts sensitive identifiers with ZK proofs, ensuring private, verifiable, and duplication-resistant asset ownership.
data.proposer_relevant_experience:
**Project Owner & Fullstack Developer \- Valdryan Ivandito**

The proposer Valdryan Ivandito serves as the sole developer and project owner for this initiative. The proposer will be responsible for the entire software lifecycle, including system architecture, compact smart contract development, web and desktop application implementation, and integration with the RFID hardware layer.



His primary roles include:

- **System Design & Architecture:** Designing the RFID–NFT interaction model and defining on-chain logic on the Midnight network.
- **Backend & Smart Contract Development:** Building APIs, Zero-Knowledge proof integrations, and privacy-preserving transaction logic.
- **Frontend Development:** Developing the ZeroTag Minter and ZeroTag Scanner application interfaces (either as a desktop or web application) for asset registration and verification.
- **Documentation:** Producing open-source documentation for community reuse.



This streamlined, single-developer structure ensures maximum efficiency and consistency across the entire development process, minimizing overhead while maintaining full control over design integrity and technical execution.

data.title: Privacy-First Mini DApps: Real-World Proofs on Midnight
data.summary: Users compelled over share personal data on forms verification should be done without compromising privacy in organization conventional digital media reveal sensitiv information and lead lack of trust
data.solution: PrivD Forms helps individuals unveil what is needed. Zero knowledge proofs authenticate answers without revealing entire information. An uncomplicated privacy-sensitive online forms with Midnight.
data.proposer_relevant_experience: Led by Dejene Mulatu and assisted by co-workers in the fields of UI design, smart contract engineering and tooling privacy. The team is shown to have experience in blockchain development, creation of practical solutions, and involvement in open-source code repositories. We will commit our focus to providing work that enhances the Cardano and Midnight ecosystem. Our company is of the opinion that privacy should be easy to the users and this project will make that a reality to many users.

data.title: Zero-Knowledge Data Validator (Reference DApp)
data.summary: Buyers cannot verify dataset quality (schema, bias, nulls) without seeing it, while sellers risk theft if they reveal raw data. This trust gap halts the exchange of AI training data.
data.solution: A Reference DApp where sellers use Midnight ZKPs to mathematically prove dataset quality without revealing raw content. It iterates through private file to verify, publishing only the result.

data.title: Glucovery: Privacy-Focused Diabetes Management
data.summary: Over 537M diabetics lose CGM data control to centralized silos. No true ownership, selective sharing, or lasting incentives exist. Uncontrolled glucose also drives obesity and cravings.
data.solution: Glucovery: Midnight-powered dApp. Own your CGM data in shielded vaults, share only ZK proofs with doctors, earn $GLUCO for healthy glucose habits, redeem for sensors/food. True ownership + incentives.

data.title: A privacy-aware three-party escrow dApp with shielded tokens
data.summary: It can be difficult for new devs to understand how to properly mint and transfer shielded tokens to/from contracts, as well as how to make good use of the witnesses and private state.
data.solution: A reference dApp showcasing a real use case for witnesses and private state to protect users data through asymmetric encryption, utilising shielded tokens to demonstrate a 3-party escrow system.

data.title: PyMidnight – Reference DApp & Python SDK for Midnight
data.summary: Python developers lack a clear Reference DApp and simple SDK to connect to Midnight and call Compact contracts, making it hard to start building privacy-preserving dApps.
data.solution: PyMidnight: a lightweight Python SDK plus a minimal Compact Reference DApp with a simple UI and Lace integration, demonstrating a full end-to-end programmable privacy flow on Midnight.

data.title: Umbra | Privacy-First Prediction Markets on Midnight
data.summary: Transparent markets expose positions, enabling copy-trading and herd bias. We lack a mechanism for "Public Volume, Private Direction" betting to protect trader intent and ensuring fair outcomes.
data.solution: Umbra uses Midnight's ZK Commit-Reveal pattern for private prediction markets. Bet volume is public but direction remains hidden, protecting trader strategy from copy-trading and bias.

data.title: Midnight Private Subscription Manager (Reference DApp)
data.summary: In web3 DApps, When user makes  subscription to service provider, they (and entire world) can see the subscriber's full wallet balance and the subscription they have made, compromising their privacy.
data.solution: We will build a Reference DApp that enables Private, Non-Custodial Recurring Payments. Allowing users to deposit funds into a Subscription Vault and authorize a provider to withdraw funds.

data.title: zkVaccine: Privacy-Preserving Vaccination Proof on Midnight
data.summary: Proving vaccination status currently requires revealing full medical records, exposing sensitive health data like dates, locations, and other vaccinations unnecessarily.
data.solution: zkVaccine enables users to prove "fully vaccinated for [disease]" using ZK proofs without revealing their complete vaccination history or personal health information.

data.title: LEGEON — Genesis Onboarding CompactDApp
data.summary: Consultant identity, credentials, and rates lack privacy. Web2 exposes PII; Web3 reveals metadata. A private, selective-disclosure onboarding layer is required for decentralized SAP consulting.
data.solution: A CompactDApp using Midnight to create encrypted consultant profiles, verify credentials off-chain, generate selective-disclosure proofs, and mint a private ProfileNFT for secure onboarding.
data.proposer_relevant_experience:
**Charles N\. Sklavanitis — Project Lead / Product Architect**

Founder of Legeon, an emerging decentralized SAP consulting network.

Former founder of LiquidMedium, a vendor-management platform used for sourcing, procurement, and management of contingent labor for Fortune 500 companies (acquired by CDI).

20+ years of SAP consulting experience (P2P, supplier integration, onboarding workflow design).

Responsible for defining requirements, solution design, privacy model, UI flows, and ensuring alignment with enterprise onboarding realities.

Oversees project delivery, documentation, repository structure, and community communication.

**CompactDApp Developer — To Be Sourced From Midnight Community**

A dedicated CompactDApp engineer will be recruited from the Midnight/Cardano developer community.

Responsibilities include: implementing the Compact script, designing the encrypted profile schema, building the proof logic, integrating Glacier + Lace flows, and supporting the reference UI.

The proposal intentionally avoids outsourcing to third-party vendors; the role is filled through the open-source Compact ecosystem to ensure alignment with Midnight foundations and best practices.

**UI / Frontend Contributor — Supporting Resource \(Part\-Time\)**

Frontend contributor (community-sourced or internal) will develop the minimal reference UI demonstrating the onboarding flow, credential input, and Lace wallet interaction.

Supporting tasks include: test plan execution, API wiring, and documentation.



All core development for this CompactDApp will be performed by the identified contributors and not outsourced.

The Compact scripts, PET logic, contract components, UI integration, and validation workflow will be implemented directly by the Legeon team (founder, Compact/Midnight developer, full-stack engineer, and privacy architect).

This ensures full alignment with the Midnight: CompactDApps category requirement that core development is executed by the proposal team itself.

data.title: Midnight dApp Starter Kit
data.summary: Developers lack an open-source Midnight starter kit, making it hard to learn Compact, integrate wallets, and build privacy-enabled DApps—slowing onboarding and ecosystem growth.
data.solution: Create an open-source Midnight dApp Starter Kit including a Compact contract, demo UI, Lace wallet integration, tests, and documentation to help developers quickly learn and build private DApps.

data.title: Proof of Plate: ZK-Compliance Circuit (Starting with Honey)
data.summary: The honey market is plagued by Honey Laundering, depressing prices for honest farmers. Meanwhile, Swiss producers face strict labeling laws but cannot prove premium origin on public blockchains.
data.solution: A Reference DApp on Midnight. ZK-proofs to verify that a physical product meets regulatory standards (e.g., Yield per Hive plausibility). We pilot this with a Swiss Honey Farm.

data.title: (MVP) Midnight VAT Guard (MVG)
data.summary: SMEs overshare sensitive financial data to prove VAT compliance. They lack a private, verifiable method. A secure VAT calculator with zero-knowledge proofs solves this.
data.solution: We will create a VAT tool where AI sorts transactions and Midnight stores private data and generates zero-knowledge proofs so SMEs can verify VAT totals without sharing raw financial records.

data.title: Midnight Typeform
data.summary: Many dynamic forms today, such as Google Forms or Typeform, ask for your personal data to prevent duplicate registrations.

data.title: Proof of Humanity Dapp on Midnight
data.summary: Online systems struggle to differentiate humans from bots without collecting sensitive personal information. CAPTCHAs are weak, intrusive, and often fail. More advanced identity systems required.
data.solution: To builds a fully open-source, functional reference DApp that allows a user to prove they are a real human through zkp, verified by a Compact contract on Midnight without revealing any biometric data.
data.proposer_relevant_experience:
It's only Individual applying for the project
